snippet.title: Epic Battle Fantasy 4 Trailer (HD)
snippet.description: I had to remake the EBF4 trailer, because the old one was super low resolution! EBF4 has recently received a quality-of-life update on Steam - adding many options to make the game more accessible and up-to-date. Narration by Joshua Tomar. More info about the update: http://kupogames.com/2021/01/14/ebf4-version-2-beta-is-live/
